discordauth-error-invalid-state: Error message shown when the OAuth state parameter is invalid or missing
discordauth-error-token: Error message shown when the OAuth token exchange fails
discordauth-error-userinfo: Error message shown when Discord user information cannot be retrieved
discordauth-error-not-member: Error message shown when the user is not a member of the required Discord server
discordauth-error-no-role: Error message shown when the user does not have any of the required roles
discordauth-error-no-account: Error message shown when no wiki account exists and auto-creation is disabled
